bestPractices.title: CNAME Best Practices
rules: Target must be a Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) ending with a dot
CNAME records cannot coexist with other record types
Avoid CNAME chains longer than 3-4 hops
Never point a CNAME to another CNAME if possible

messages.missingDot: Target should end with '.' to be a proper FQDN
messages.loop: Creates a circular reference that will cause DNS resolution to fail
messages.selfTarget: Points to itself, which is not allowed
